title: Elon Musk’s xAI raises $20 billion to expand data centers and research
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI has raised $20 billion from investors, a funding round that could value the company above $230 billion and deepen the intensifying race to build the world’s most powerful AI systems.
content:
The company said it would use the funding to “expand its decisive compute advantage” as it built data centers to power its technology and to “fuel groundbreaking research.”
The funding is part of a frenzy over AI companies, with investors plowing eno... [2116 chars]

title: Lenovo expands AI push with Nvidia tie-up, unveils Qira personal AI platform
description: Lenovo has announced a strategic partnership with Nvidia to speed up the deployment of AI data centres, alongside unveiling Qira, a personal AI platform designed to work across Lenovo and Motorola devices, as the company ramps up its artificial intelligence ambitions at CES in Las Vegas.
content: China’s Lenovo,, the world’s largest personal computer maker, on Tuesday said it has teamed up with U.S. AI chip leader Nvidia to help AI cloud providers quickly put data centres into operation, as it strives to establish itself in AI. The technology... [429 chars]

title: Google, Character.AI agree to settle suits involving teen suicide
description: Google and startup Character.AI have settled lawsuits filed by families accusing artificial intelligence chatbots of harming minors, per filings
content:
Google and startup Character.AI have settled lawsuits filed by families accusing artificial intelligence chatbots of harming minors, including contributing to a Florida teenager's suicide, according to court filings Wednesday.

title: In China, AI is finding deadly tumors that doctors might miss
description: Chinese doctors are using artificial intelligence to spot and treat hard-to-detect cancer tumors.
content: This was possible only because of a new artificial-intelligence-powered tool that the hospital was testing, which had flagged Qiu’s routine CT scan before he had any symptoms. The tool is one example of how Chinese tech companies and hospitals are ra... [6400 chars]

title: Doctors, startups discuss use of Artificial Intelligence in hospital at GIMS Greater Noida
description: The discussions marked the on-ground culmination of India’s first AI clinic established within a government medical institution, following its national online inauguration last week
content:
Organised by the Centre for Medical Innovation (CMI GIMS), the roundtable brought together clinicians, policymakers, AI experts and MedTech startups to assess whether emerging tools are ready for routine patient care.

title: AI helps pave the way for self-driving cars
description: Even if Elon Musk's dream of robotaxis for everyone is a long way off, sleek electric cars powered by artificial intelligence packed the Consumer Electronics Show, promising to liberate people from the tedium of driving.

title: AI Revolution in Financial Markets: Technology Democratizes Analysis But May Amplify Volatility
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing financial markets by democratizing analytical capabilities previously exclusive to professional fund managers, enabling instant processing of complex market data that once required weeks of human analysis. This technological shift narrows the advantage gap between institutional investors and individual traders while introducing new volatility risks. As AI accelerates herd behavior formation and dissolution, markets may experience sharper and more frequent volatility swings, fundamentally changing how investment returns are generated in the modern financial landscape.
content: Artificial intelligence is reshaping financial markets in unprecedented ways, fundamentally altering how investment decisions are made and potentially increasing market volatility. The technology that creates realistic videos and generates human-like... [5163 chars]
